Lights, Camera, Africa! bụ mmemme ihe nkiri a na-eme kwa afọ na Lagos kemgbe afọ 2011.
Ọ bụ Ugoma Adegoke guzobere emume ahụ. N'ịbụ nke The Life House chikọbara, mmemme Lights, Camera, Africa! nke mbụ sitere na nkwado New York African Film Festival, Inc
ma gosiputa ụbọchị atọ, site na 30 Septemba ruo 2 Ọktoba 2011.
